name: Green Nature Resort & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrived late at night , just before 11pm.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: Hotel absolutely fine with an army of staff to keep everything clean and tidy.
reviews.title: Fantasic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food great with plenty of choice.
reviews.title: Spa hotel

reviews.text: Just watch out for the girls on the reception, they have a couple of tricks. When requiring beach towels they insisted we paid in pounds for the deposit (£20 for 2 towels). I did sign the receipt so it was my fault for not checking, but this was recorded as 2 x 20 lire and so only got back 40 lire (down about 4 quid)
reviews.title: “Uninspired and Uninspiring”
Nice, but don't know if I would return
reviews.text: Another time we got a receptionist to telephone the local number for the transfer back to the airport. No problem, we were charged 3 lire and she insisted we paid straight away. I saw her tap something on her scene and sure enough we were charged 2 lire on our bill. We refused to pay.

the hotel have a great hairdresser suleyman. at october last year i went there for my extations, it was the first time i have one, and ofter 6 mounth i still have them, it's really good quality because at my country belgium they can do it for this price and it's from real hair, i went back to hotel the 15 april and he still know me, he's a good hairdresser and loved his work, he had a special place in my heart, so if you at hotel go to visite his store and you will see it..
reviews.title: suleyman the hairdresser

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked the holiday last minute at a good price. We looked at trip advisor and felt the majority were giving good reports. Check in was quick with a room in main building on top floor with a good sea view.
reviews.title: Not for us

reviews.text: Unfortunately that is where the good ended for us, when we arrived the toilet didn't work and and had to be fixed. We only had warm water for washing and showering for 1 hour in the morning and evening we complained for 3days but nothing happened. The noise from the karaoke and disco was loud in our room until midnight then people shouting round the pool until 2 am so we didn't get much sleep for 3 nights.
reviews.title: A good holiday

reviews.text: The restaurant was very large and basic with nicely presented food however. except for the food from the outside cooking stations the rest was cold, we ended up heating it up in the microwave.
reviews.title: would recommend and stay again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In our opinion the spirits were not strong, yes they come out of a bottle and you had large measures but we had several of these each on our first afternoon and should have been leg less, we weren't even tipsy. However we found this is the same in other hotels so it is not specific to this hotel. The lounge bar was very busy in the evening with standing room only on our first few nights not a relaxing place to be.
reviews.title: Would definitely go back!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: me and my wife stayed at the green nature resort,on 6th may 2013 and arrived about 11.30 at night and we are used to places like spain where you have a little wait to get your door key. not here the quiew was from the reception to about 20 yards and outside the door,everything was getting logged on the computer and it took about 10 minutes each person to get seen to so after about 2 hours we managed to get our key. whe we tried the room we had a toilet that did not flush.and no hot water. i did not want to wait another 2 hours at reception to complain so we waited till the next morning, the people at reception seemed to say one thing and then ignore you they said someone will fix the problem but after waiting 5 hours qnd stil; nothing sorted i went back to reception and asked why nothing has been done only to be told it was going to be fixed when i asked when i treated as i if i was the one who was being unreasonable, still nothing was done I saw the Thomson rep at 7pm and complained to her and she was great and got on to them, and she said she would not leave till it was sorted unfortunately still nothing was done so we conplained back to the thomson rep and demanded a different room and we eventually received a new room. alll the staff except the ones on reception where great.The hotel has an entertainment section,which consisted of about 10 lads who looked like they about 17 years old and high on something, the room we had also had all the air conditioning units outside so a very noisy night we had The morning consisted in these draft dodgers walking around the pool trying to talk funny and trying to drag every one into playing some stupid pool side game which was distracting for someone like me who just wants to relax and do his own thing they are other people working there such as hairdressers and photografers who walk around the pool trying to sell there wares. which i for one do not like, the food they serve is great if you like chicken or meatballs if you do not well not much to write home about. they did not have sausage or bacon or fried eggs for breakfast they did have salad for breakfast though, on the plus side the staff do try but i would pay the extra got back to spain or majorca next year
reviews.title: not really good value

reviews.text: Hotel is lovely and very good for the family
reviews.title: lots of fun fun fun

reviews.text: The boys around the pool are amazing they will do there best to ensure you have fun and they never stop just a bit like JR(aye). If you decide to use this hotel which i would gladly do again then your be glad too meet the fun summer team.
reviews.title: Great for families

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Theres lots for everyone to do from sitting and soaking up the sun to listening to dancing or vollyball in the pool
reviews.title: Would defo go again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and myself chose this hotel as we were going with his 2 daughters aged 15 and 17 and wanted a lively hotel, We really couldn't fault a thing. The youngest daughter is vegetarian and VERY fussy but had no problem as there was a very large selection of food at all meal times. The Animation were fantastic and all staff were helpful, We spent most evenings at Dianas bar 2 mins down the road, you really must try this place. We celebrated our youngest's 16th Birthday there and it will be one she will remember for years, food, entertainment and staff were absolutely fantastic and the girls fell in love with Charlie, the monkey.
reviews.title: Dont take note of negative responses :)
Not our cup of tea!
reviews.text: We saw this advertised at a great price - on reviewing the hotel I was a bit concerned at first as it's a big hotel, and seeing the waterslides thought it was probably aimed at families. However, we mistakenly thought: a) the kids had just been on 2 weeks Easter holidays so there wouldn't be too many; and b) it's still out of season so the hotel would be a bit quieter. Wrong - the place was hoaching with kids of all ages who were allowed to run wild and it was much busier than we thought (obviously everyone was taking up the fact that the holiday was cheap.

reviews.title: Ok.....but would'nt return NOT a 5*
reviews.text: I'll start with the positives:

reviews.title: Nice hotel
reviews.text: The place is spotless throughout and constantly being cleaned, public areas are very nice with comfortable sofas in the lobby bar, and comfy chairs in the amphi bar, drinks are fine (except for the white wine - only way it's drinkable is to dilute it with water or lemonade), tea/coffee machines plentiful with water coolers and fruit juices, two nice large pools, couple of shops on site, the spa looks nice and treatments are reasonably prices although we didn't book any, hairdresser on site , tattoo & piercing parlour if that's your thing.

reviews.title: Good Resort but.....
reviews.text: Towels are availabie for a 40 TL deposit, which was returned at the end of the week. Only downside was you need to get them from the spa and were given the hard sell every time you went to change your towels.

reviews.title: An affordable getaway
reviews.text: Negatives:

description: The Green Nature Resort offers more than 630 rooms with a capacity of a total of 1419 beds. From this 265 rooms are in the annex and 365 rooms in the Resort. The annex offers more than 220 standard rooms, 30 family rooms as well as other 15 Triple room. In the Resort offering our guests 239 standard rooms, 20 family rooms (2 bathrooms), 20 family rooms (1 bathroom), 26 suites, 68 Triple rooms as well as 2 rooms suitable for the handicapped. The rooms are comfortable and modern equipped. All of our rooms include bathroom / jacuzzi, air-conditioning, phone, rent strongbox, minibar, hairdryer, satellite TV, fire alarm system. Annex rooms equipped with shower room instead of bathroom. Our family-friendly rooms offer two separate rooms. If requested a baby bed is also available.
